channel.title: How old you should be to play rs or rsps
channel.description:
so i was wondering how old do YOU think someone needs to be to play rs or rsps id say 7+ but you know only my opinion, but i will not be voting so it doesn't really matter.
i put a new option some people agreed and it made me think that too

item.title: How old you should be to play rs or rsps

i dont think its imo its emo lol wow and please i dont worship anyone but god… espaclly normal people i respect mods and admins but not worship and here is who im talking abouth.

lol wow so many posts and even an admin posted but id say 11+
[/quote]
This doesn’t have that many posts lol…

You seem like the kinda person that worships an In-Game player mod… just imo

item.title: How old you should be to play rs or rsps
item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

[quote=“Scape-JAVA, post:28, topic:309799”][quote author=`Aaron link=topic=406243.msg3003369#msg3003369 date=1256181912]

I’d say 17+. I think that is how it used to be not too long ago, when it was actually a decent game to play.

So do you still play RuneScape on a regular basis, or just stick to the RSPS community now?

RuneScape Fucking sucks, i’d just rather stick with moparscape.

Yeah but I still play it. No sense of acheivement typing “::master” all the time (dislike commands by the way).

True but i still hate RuneScape and always will.

Scape-Java, i believe that Runescape lost it’s classical feel. Jagex wanted to keep up with all of the new graphics that was coming out and they made a bad mistake. Runescape-HD is horrible, i miss the old interfaces and the fun with friends, Runescape, Lan party with friends, Starbucks coffee, cigars, bud light and a whole lot of fun. I still play Runescape from time to time and i am gradually getting 99 attack, but most of my friends quit when the good wilderness was removed, it isn’t the same anymore and that ticks me off.

I hope in the near future Jagex will release some kind of update where we will able to go back to the old interfaces and enjoy the classical feel so we can all relax, the wilderness is gone but if they bring back the old interfaces as an option im sure it will take quite a bit of anger off of our shoulders so we can finally relax.
[/quote]

Yes this is why i’m creating an osRemake With flawless pking ect…[/quote]

Scape-Java it’s all the same all private servers are for is pking, because people wanted it back you’ll have to compete with other big servers that have many other features too.

Read full topic
item.source: How old you should be to play rs or rsps

item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[quote="`Aaron, post:27, topic:309799"][quote author=Scape-JAVA link=topic=406243.msg3003367#msg3003367 date=1256181595]

I’d say 17+. I think that is how it used to be not too long ago, when it was actually a decent game to play.

So do you still play RuneScape on a regular basis, or just stick to the RSPS community now?

RuneScape Fucking sucks, i’d just rather stick with moparscape.

Yeah but I still play it. No sense of acheivement typing “::master” all the time (dislike commands by the way).

True but i still hate RuneScape and always will.
[/quote]

Scape-Java, i believe that Runescape lost it’s classical feel. Jagex wanted to keep up with all of the new graphics that was coming out and they made a bad mistake. Runescape-HD is horrible, i miss the old interfaces and the fun with friends, Runescape, Lan party with friends, Starbucks coffee, cigars, bud light and a whole lot of fun. I still play Runescape from time to time and i am gradually getting 99 attack, but most of my friends quit when the good wilderness was removed, it isn’t the same anymore and that ticks me off.

I hope in the near future Jagex will release some kind of update where we will able to go back to the old interfaces and enjoy the classical feel so we can all relax, the wilderness is gone but if they bring back the old interfaces as an option im sure it will take quite a bit of anger off of our shoulders so we can finally relax.[/quote]

Yes this is why i’m creating an osRemake With flawless pking ect…

Read full topic

item.title: How old you should be to play rs or rsps
item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

[quote=“Scape-JAVA, post:26, topic:309799”][quote author=Lust.BS link=topic=406243.msg3003276#msg3003276 date=1256174958]

I’d say 17+. I think that is how it used to be not too long ago, when it was actually a decent game to play.

So do you still play RuneScape on a regular basis, or just stick to the RSPS community now?

RuneScape Fucking sucks, i’d just rather stick with moparscape.

Yeah but I still play it. No sense of acheivement typing “::master” all the time (dislike commands by the way).
[/quote]

True but i still hate RuneScape and always will.[/quote]

Scape-Java, i believe that Runescape lost it’s classical feel. Jagex wanted to keep up with all of the new graphics that was coming out and they made a bad mistake. Runescape-HD is horrible, i miss the old interfaces and the fun with friends, Runescape, Lan party with friends, Starbucks coffee, cigars, bud light and a whole lot of fun. I still play Runescape from time to time and i am gradually getting 99 attack, but most of my friends quit when the good wilderness was removed, it isn’t the same anymore and that ticks me off.

I hope in the near future Jagex will release some kind of update where we will able to go back to the old interfaces and enjoy the classical feel so we can all relax, the wilderness is gone but if they bring back the old interfaces as an option im sure it will take quite a bit of anger off of our shoulders so we can finally relax.

Read full topic

item.title: How old you should be to play rs or rsps
item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

Personally i would have an idea for a new community to be a mature based one, you sign up, you are interviewed by a Admin, or a GM and you would discuss how you would act towards others in the community, and be put on a probationary period, and let the outcome be determined by the staff member, and if necessary other members of the community.

It would have to be moderated by a certain few staff members that have a maturity level high enough to determine if the individual applying to be apart of the community should be aloud to stay there. Even though this would have a mature outcome it would be long and tedious and the people would have to be extremely dedicated to have a community full of mature posters that understand the outcome of their actions, and if they had good actions they would have good consequences.

Read full topic
item.source: How old you should be to play rs or rsps

item.title: How old you should be to play rs or rsps
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:19, topic:309799”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=406243.msg3002974#msg3002974 date=1256157558]

[quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=406243.msg3002961#msg3002961 date=1256157015]

[5(√-1)] / [(√.25i^2)] = Age they should be.
[/quote]Approved.

<3. Someone will solve it sooner or later. It takes 10 seconds.
[/quote]The variable ‘i’ replaces the negative within a radical, correct…?[/quote]
i = √-1

item.title: How old you should be to play rs or rsps
item.description:
@1336.9 wrote:

RuneScape should NOT be allowed for kids to play, they’re really annoying and pissing me off. It’s WAY better to play it with older/mature people where they talk mature, unlike those 8-10 year olds acting tough, don’t know the meaning of the word “noob”.
